column1: #text=I went to college in a big city and did n't have a car on campus .
#text=Thankfully , there was n't a need for one because the public transportation system was great .
#text=I often went to visit my friend that went to school on the other side of town .
#text=I always took a public bus to get there .
#text=The first thing I would do is look up the bus route and schedule .
#text=Once I knew what time the bus would arrive , I 'd walk to the bus stop and wait on the bench .
#text=Once the bus arrived , I would pay the driver via a electronic machine and was then on my life .
#text=The bus would make many stops before arriving at mine .
#text=At one point , the bus was full and I gave up my seat so that an older lady could sit down .
#text=Once I saw that my stop was arriving , I pulled the lever to let the bus driver know that I wanted to depart the bus at the next stop .
#text=I then thanked the driver and was on my way .
